formattedAddress: 256 W 116th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 256 W 116th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10026, USA

originalText.text:
As a first-time renter in NYC, I recently embarked on the challenging journey of finding an apartment within a specific budget. I chose Bohemia Group, attracted by their willingness to help me find a place under $2,000. My initial impressions of the apartment I ended up renting were mixed, primarily due to its neighborhood. However, upon viewing it in person, thanks to the diligent efforts of my Bohemia agent, I found the apartment surprisingly appealing, especially considering its affordability in such an expensive city.

The application process was smooth, and I was thrilled to secure the apartment. However, two weeks into my new home, a conversation with friends and colleagues brought to light a significant oversight on my part regarding the broker's fee. In NYC, it's common to pay only one month's rent as a broker's fee, but I ended up paying the equivalent of two months' rent. This was a result of my assumption and lack of inquiry about the fee structure. It's a hard lesson in the importance of clarifying financial aspects in real estate transactions, particularly for someone who carefully manages their finances and deeply respects the value of their hard-earned income.

While I acknowledge the necessity of a broker's fee and the value of the service provided by Bohemia Group, I wish I had been more proactive in discussing and negotiating this cost. The realization that I could have potentially reduced this expense is a tough pill to swallow, especially when my personal valuation of the apartment doesn't align with the fee paid.

I'm sharing my experience to highlight the importance of openly discussing and negotiating broker fees, a crucial step I overlooked. To future NYC renters, especially those navigating this market for the first time: ensure you fully understand and discuss all costs involved. This not only helps in budgeting effectively but also in making informed decisions that align with your financial comfort.

Overall, I appreciate Bohemia Group's role in helping me find an apartment that fits my budget, and I hope my experience serves as a useful guide for others embarking on a similar journey.

originalText.text: We had the pleasure of working with the Baker-Ripley team and we couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Chantelle was very responsive, informative, and guaranteed our success in finding a new home. They were always so patient and kind being that it was our first time renting and we 100% felt taken care of. If we decide to move again we’re definitely checking in with Bohemia to see what they have to offer.

originalText.text: Andy was an absolute pleasure to work with both times he was our broker. Not only was he communicative and open, but he really was our advocate during the entire process and made it as easy and hassle free as possible, going out of his way to make sure we were able to focus on our move and not deal with the more “annoying” parts of apartment hunting. He was and continues to be an incredible broker and we would be more than happy to work with him in the future if/when it becomes relevant again!

originalText.text:
My boyfriend and I recently had the pleasure of working with Erin Whitney, and we could not be more satisfied with the service we received. From the initial tour to the completion of the rental contract, every step of the process was handled with professionalism and expertise.

Erin demonstrated a deep understanding of the apartment environment and the neighborhood. She helped expedite our application and kept us informed of the progress. Erin patiently explained the contract to us. Even after we moved in, she assisted in clarifying matters with the management team to waive the first-year amenity fee. Throughout the entire process, she consistently responded promptly to our questions.

We were truly impressed by her sense of responsibility. We highly recommend Erin to anyone seeking a reliable and knowledgeable broker. Her commitment to client satisfaction makes her an excellent choice for everyone.

originalText.text: Kristina Huegel was great to work with. She was the real estate agent who put everything together for me and my new roommates. The process went smoothly. She was responsive and professional. Full transparency. No surprises. I'm happy with the service i got and would highly recommend her and Bohemia Realty Group to anyone looking for a new place.
